comments.raw_text:
STR:

Start off with <dialog buttonlabelaccept="Yes">

Then:
dialog.setAttribute("buttonlabelaccept", "Proceed");

The Yes doesn't change.

AFAIK (though I might be wrong) we can't really hook into setAttribute, so it might make sense to introduce getters and setters for this. Regardless, this is pretty unintuitive.
comments.creator: rain@sunshowers.io
